meanings.sent1: The adorablenesses of the puppies melted everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent2: Her adorablenesses made her the favorite in the class.
meanings.sent3: The adorablenesses of the baby's giggles filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent4: The adorablenesses of the kittens were like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the adorablenesses of the little ducklings following their mother.

meanings.definition: The state or condition of being lovable or charming.
meanings.sent1: The adorablenesses of the teddy bear made it a cherished gift.
meanings.sent2: The adorablenesses of the child's smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent3: His adorablenesses always helped him get away with mischief.
meanings.sent4: The adorablenesses of the old couple's love story touched everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent5: The adorablenesses of the baby's laughter echoed through the house.
